about.text1: I've been creating websites using HTML, CSS, Javascript and PHP since I was a teenager.
about.text2: In 2019, I took online courses to get into website and mobile app development professionally.
about.text3: Since then I have worked as a freelancer for two companies,
about.text5: I am responsible for the further and new development of complex websites and mobile apps.
about.text6: I speak excellent English and advanced Croatian. But my native language is German.
about.text7: I am married and have one child.

vocabularyTrainer.text1: Web App for learning Croatian language. Made with Angular.
vocabularyTrainer.text2: Android App for learning Croatian language. Made with Angular and Ionic.

catchCups.text2: I worked on a mobile app that evaluates measurement data from an irrigation system for lawns. The app was made with Angular and Ionic.

webaro.text2: , I worked on the further development of a web app for the efficient planning and evaluation of drone data in the agricultural sector. Realized with Angular, on behalf of

contact.headline: Let's Get In Touch!
contact.text1: Ready to start your next project with me?
